#text=Although I keep my head mostly shaved very , very short I decided to get a haircut .
#text=Summer is fast approaching and the shorter the better to keep my old head nice and cool .
#text=I gathered the clippers , towel , a razor for the neck shave and awaited my wife to get home from her job .
#text=I always get her to cut my hair as she is really good at it albeit a tad slow getting it done .
#text=When she arrived she smiled when she saw the tools for a haircut gathered and got right to work .
#text=She placed the towel over my shoulders and proceeded to get to work with the clippers .
#text=Fine pieces of hair fell in the floor as she ran the clippers over my head .
#text=Then my neck was lathered up and the razor used to shave that area .
#text=A quick shower later and I felt like a new man .
